first_translate: so this is a berserk demon...
second_translate: So this is a berserk monster...

hangle: 이런 게 풀려났다면 많은 사상자를 냈겠지.
first_translate: if this thing had been released, it would have caused many casualties.
second_translate: If something like this had been released, it would have caused many casualties.

first_translate: fiona was right to rush the operation.
second_translate: Fiona was right to hasten the operation.

first_translate: a large number of demons are approaching!
second_translate: A large number of monsters are approaching!

first_translate: I’m glad I came to check on the situation.
second_translate: I'm glad I came to assess the situation.

first_translate: kill them all and leave none alive!
second_translate: Kill them all and leave no one alive!

first_translate: he truly is the guardian of winter...!
second_translate: He truly is the Guardian of Winter...!

hangle: 이건 확실하게 목을 잘라야 하는 마물인가 보네.
first_translate: I guess this is a demon that needs to have its head cut off.
second_translate: Looks like this is a monster that definitely needs to be beheaded.

first_translate: should I help with the other demons too?
second_translate: Should I help take care of the other monsters too?

first_translate: I’ll handle it with the knights.
second_translate: The knights and I will handle it.

hangle: 같이 처리하는 게 좋을 것 같은데.
first_translate: I think it would be better if we handled it together.
second_translate: I think it would be better to take care of it together.

first_translate: if you’re worried, you can give me a kiss.
second_translate: If you're that worried, you could at least give me a kiss.

first_translate: you’re really enjoying life these days, aren’t you?
second_translate: …You’re having a lot of fun these days, aren’t you?
Just go quickly and come back.

hangle: 이렇게 작은 여자가 이 일의 책임자라고?
first_translate: this small woman is the one responsible for all this?
second_translate: This tiny woman is the one in charge of all this?

hangle: 아무래도 드디어 말이 통할 만한 상대가 온 것 같군요…
first_translate: it seems like I’ve finally met someone I can reason with...
second_translate: It seems like I've finally met someone I can communicate with...

hangle: 제게 이런 식으로 굴면 후에 틀림없이 후회하실 겁니다.
first_translate: if you treat me like this, you will surely regret it later.
second_translate: If you treat me this way, you will surely regret it later.

first_translate: I’ll have to scare her a little.
second_translate: I'll have to scare him a little.

first_translate: I’m telling you this as a special favor.
second_translate: I'm telling you this exclusively for you.

hangle: 제 뒤에는 매우 무서운 분들이 있거든요.
first_translate: there are very powerful people behind me.
second_translate: There are very dangerous people backing me.

first_translate: thanks to them, we won’t be in the red this year.
second_translate: Thanks to them, we won’t have a deficit this year.

first_translate: they’ll all be stripped of their titles.
second_translate: They’ll be completely stripped of everything.

hangle: 제가 감히 입에 올릴 수 없이 고귀한 분도 계시죠!
first_translate: there’s also someone so noble that I dare not even mention their name!
second_translate: There is also someone so noble that I wouldn't even dare to mention their name!

hangle: 절 풀어주시면 이번 일은 전부 없던 걸로 해 드리죠.
first_translate: if you let me go, I’ll forget this ever happened.
second_translate: If you let me go, I’ll act like this never happened.

first_translate: do you know who I am?
second_translate: Do you know who I am?

first_translate: we found him inside the arena.
second_translate: He was found inside the arena.

first_translate: I am the crown prince of this empire...

second_translate: Y-you don’t need to know, you wretch!

hangle: 그럼 현재 당신은 방금 무례를 저지른 한낱 범죄자군요.
first_translate: then right now, you’re just a criminal who has been rude to me.
second_translate: Then right now, you’re nothing more than a criminal who has just been rude.

first_translate: it looks like things have been settled here too.
second_translate: It looks like things are mostly settled here too.
Do you know who I am, criminal?

first_translate: how dare you shout at the crown prince.
second_translate: How dare you raise your voice at the crown prince?

first_translate: I’m curious to know who you are to have such nerve.
second_translate: I'm curious to know who has the audacity to act this way.

hangle: 신원 미상의 범죄자 얼굴 좀 볼까?
first_translate: let’s see the face of this unidentified criminal.
second_translate: Let's take a look at the face of this unidentified criminal.

first_translate: oh my, I didn’t recognize you at all.
second_translate: Oh my, I completely failed to recognize you.

hangle: 어째서 이런 곳에 계시는 겁니까, 형님?
first_translate: what are you doing in a place like this, brother?
second_translate: Why are you in a place like this, brother?
